title: Jair Bolsonaro: The President Who Promised to Kill 30,000 People
itunes:title: Jair Bolsonaro: The President Who Promised to Kill 30,000 People
description:
In episode 32, Robert is joined by actor and activist Behzad Dabu to discuss Jair Bolsonaro, a murderous nutjob who was elected the President of Brazil.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
